data.title: Sheriff's Office
data.text:
Second Annual Sheriff's Office Open House

Join us on October 19th 2024 for a day of fun and community spirit at the Second Annual Sheriff's Office Open House! Step into our world at 250 E. Hackett Road and experience an unforgettable day with your loved ones. Indulge in delicious food, drinks, sweets, and exciting police demonstrations await on the front lawnâ€”perfect for the whole family! Let's celebrate safety, unity, and a stronger community!

Apply

Your journey begins right here, with the pivotal first step: your application. Click below to explore current openings and seize your chance to make a difference today!

Click Here

PHYSICAL & WRITTEN TEST

Once your application is complete, get ready for the next phase: the Physical & Written Test! This is where your skills and abilities will be put to the test. Click below for all details you need to successfully complete this step towards your career with the Stanislaus County Sheriff's Department!

Click Here

ORAL BOARD INTERVIEW

After your Physical & Written Test, get ready for the next step: the Oral Board Interviews! This is your chance to showcase your knowledge, skills, and determination to join the ranks of the Stanislaus County Sheriff's Department.

ACADEMY

Once you successfully completing the application process, you will begin your training in one of our academies. Click below for more information and get ready to kickstart your thrilling career with us!

Click Here

FIELD TRAINING PROGRAM

Get ready to for the final step: the Field Training Program! This is your chance to showcase everything you've learned and show that you have what it takes to excel as a Peace Officer.
